mapper.select: select ID, CREATED_TIME, CREATOR, CREATOR_ID, LAST_UPDATE_ID, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATER, COMPANY_ID, CONTENT, START_TIME, END_TIME, DELETED, SPARE1, SPARE2, SPARE3, SPARE4, SPARE5 from points_alliance.notice where ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
update points_alliance.notice
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime},
CREATOR = #{creator},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId},
LAST_UPDATE_ID = #{lastUpdateId},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime},
LAST_UPDATER = #{lastUpdater},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId},
CONTENT = #{content},
START_TIME = #{startTime},
END_TIME = #{endTime},
DELETED = #{deleted},
SPARE1 = #{spare1},
SPARE2 = #{spare2},
SPARE3 = #{spare3},
SPARE4 = #{spare4},
SPARE5 = #{spare5},
where ID = #{id}
mapper.delete:
update points_alliance.notice set DELETED = 1, LAST_UPDATE_ID = #{updateId}, LAST_UPDATER = #{updater}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{dateTime} where ID in
#{id}
